mapper.select: select num, id, code, date_format(eatdate, '%y-%m-%d') as eatdate,count from consume where id = #{id:VARCHAR} and code= #{code:INTEGER}
select num,id, f.code,f.name as fname, date_format(eatdate, '%y-%m-%d') as eatdate,count from consume c join food f using(code) where id = #{id}
select c.code, f.name as fname, sum(count) as count from consume c join food f using(code) where id =#{id} group by c.code order by sum(count) desc limit 5
